title: DDFP 301: Week 8 picks, Rams' Laurinaitis & Cowboys' Escobar
itunes:title: DDFP 301: Week 8 picks, Rams' Laurinaitis & Cowboys' Escobar
description:
Shek makes his Week 8 picks alongside Handsome Hank, Elliot Harrison and NFL researcher Drew Christensen. The guys also debate the best sitcom of the 90s before James Laurinaitis joins to discuss the Rams' special teams tricks and more. Cowboys tight end Gavin Escobar also dials in to talk about the team's 6-1 start. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
